name: 02-Data Description and Preparation
content:
Data Description and Preparation

Data Description:

The dataset contains audit, financial, and historical scores for BTS deployment sites.

Field NameDescriptionCityName of the city where BTS deployment is being evaluated.Location_ScoreLocation-based advantage/risk score.Internal_Audit_ScoreScore (0–100) from internal audits on compliance & operational health.External_Audit_ScoreIndependent audit score (0–100) on compliance & performance.Fin_ScoreFinancial risk score indicating local financial health & stability.Loss_ScoreScore representing expected or actual financial/service losses.Past_ResultHistorical performance score of telecom operations in the location.BTS_Deploy_Under_RiskTarget variable: 1 = Risky deployment, 0 = Safe deployment.

Data Preparation Steps:

1.Cleaning:

  • Handle missing or inconsistent score entries.
  • Normalize numeric values to ensure comparability across audit and financial metrics.

2.Feature Engineering:

  • Generate Composite Risk Index combining financial and audit scores.
  • Apply scaling/standardization for model compatibility.

3.Encoding:

  • Encode city or regional identifiers for geographic-level modeling.

4.Splitting:

  • Partition dataset into training (70%) and testing (30%) for model validation.
